CollectionCitations.Creator: Yaun, T.
CollectionCitations.Title: MODIS Aqua L3 occurrence frequency of low cloud types monthly mean and annual mean 2x2 degree resolution
CollectionCitations.Publisher: Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center (GES DISC)

EntryTitle: MODIS Aqua L3 occurrence frequency of low-cloud types monthly mean and annual mean 2x2 degree resolution

PublicationReferences.Author: Yuan, T., Song, H., Wood, R., Mohrmann, J., Meyer, K., Oreopoulos, L., and Platnick, S
PublicationReferences.Title: Applying deep learning to NASA MODIS data to create a community record of marine low-cloud mesoscale morphology

Quality: The latitudes, longitudes, and model predicted low cloud types of the chopped blocks (128 pixels x 128 pixels size) from the MODIS Aqua granule data are aggregated at 2.0° x 2.0° grids, to derive the occurrence frequency of six low cloud types (both annual mean and monthly means). Only daytime granule data are used. Blocks with sensor zenith angle > 45 are excluded.

RelatedUrls.Description: Access the dataset landing page from the GES DISC website.
Use the Earthdata Search to find and retrieve data sets across multiple data centers.
Access the data via the OPeNDAP protocol.
How to read and plot the data.

Abstract:
MODIS Aqua L3 occurrence frequency of low cloud types (OFLCT) is part of our global MODIS Aqua data from the 2017 MEaSUREs project, A Comprehensive Data Record of Marine Low-level and Deep Convective Cloud Systems Using an Object-Oriented Approach.

This file provides the aggregated occurrence frequency of low-cloud types for the years 2003-2020 at monthly and annual intervals. The latitude and longitude variables from MYD_L2_CB; and latitude, longitude and pred_cat from MYD_L2_MPLCT were used to calculate the occurrence frequency of six low-cloud types in 2.0° x 2.0° grids for 60°S-60°N and 180°W-180°E. The six low cloud types are Closed-cellular MCC, Clustered Cumulus, Disorganized  MCC, Open-cellular  MCC,  Solid Stratus, and Suppressed Cumulus.

The DOIs of the related datasets in this project are:
MYD_L2_CB_001 DOI: 10.5067/DFDGJR6707D8
MYD_L2_MPLCT_001 DOI: 10.5067/8TDZURGRLN9I
